meanings.definition: Foolish or trivial talk or behavior
meanings.sent1: Her constant tushery during class disrupted the lesson.
meanings.sent2: The group's tushery made it hard to focus on the task at hand.
meanings.sent3: The tushery at the party was entertaining but also a bit annoying.
meanings.sent4: His tushery was like a colorful balloon floating in a serious meeting.
meanings.sent5: The tushery of the children filled the room with laughter.

meanings.sent1: I can't believe you fell for such obvious tushery.
meanings.sent2: The article was full of political tushery that misled many readers.
meanings.sent3: His excuse for being late was pure tushery.
meanings.sent4: The tushery of the conspiracy theories was spreading like wildfire.
meanings.sent5: The tushery of the situation was so clear once the truth came out.
